summary: This document is a letter from Ghislaine Maxwell to Scott Stackman and Lyle Casriel at UBS Private Wealth Management, authorizing the transfer of $14,200,000 from her account to the Angara Trust. It details multiple transfers from accounts titled in her name to the Angara Trust.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the sender of the letter, authorizing the transfer of funds from her account to the Angara Trust.

persons.name: Scott Stackman
persons.context: Scott Stackman is one of the recipients of the letter from Ghislaine Maxwell regarding the fund transfers.

persons.name: Lyle Casriel
persons.context: Lyle Casriel is another recipient of the letter from Ghislaine Maxwell concerning the transfers.

connections.description: Ghislaine Maxwell is a client of Scott Stackman, who works at UBS Private Wealth Management.
Ghislaine Maxwell is a client of Lyle Casriel, who is also at UBS Private Wealth Management.

events.title: Authorization of Fund Transfers
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell authorizes the transfer of $14,200,000 from her account to the Angara Trust and details additional transfers.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell authorized the transfer of $14,200,000 from her account to the Angara Trust.
The letter was addressed to Scott Stackman and Lyle Casriel at UBS Private Wealth Management.
Multiple transfers from accounts titled in Ghislaine Maxwell's name to the Angara Trust were detailed in the letter.
